title: Question:
author: Dyberry909
content: https://acctbank.com                                                                                       DISCLAIMER: These are not cracked accounts. All our accounts are legal, registered and owned by us.These accounts can be used for joining giveaways, surveys, botting, spamming, etc. We are not responsible for the use of these email addresses. Please don't get confused by the low prices, our accounts are registered with high-quality IPs to ensure the maximum quality and minimum ban risk.Common terms:ADS: Facebook advert account (which can also be used for marketplace)>50: Above 50 friends' accounts<50: Below 50 friends' accountsHigh quality Facebook accounts(resellers prices) bulk purchase prices may be lesser USA facebook accounts+full email access(7$)Eu countries facebook accounts+full email access(6$)Asia facebook accounts+full email access(5$ and 3$ for some other asia contries)south America facebook accounts(5$)Facebook accounts(<50)Random countries <50 friends (1.3$)random Eu countries <50 friends(2.5$)Usa account <50 friends (2.5$)Facebook ads account2 line identity verifieid ads accounts(10$)3 line resistant ads accounts(12$)Facebook businees manager account (BM)Usa verified Bm (80$)Eu verified Bm (70$)Twitter accountsUsa twitter account+ full emaill access(1.2$Eu twitter account + fulll email access(1$)Instagram accountsInstagram accounts without post(1$)Instagram accounts with post (2$)Facebook FanpageOld Eu Facebook Fanpage (1k+ followers and likes 10$Old Eu fanpage (500 folowers and likes 8$)Premium Vpn accountIp vanish premium Vpn (5$)Express vpn premium account(10$)Google Voice accountGmail Google voice account (3.2$)Domain Google voice account (1.4$)Please keep in mind this list might be outdated. Always check https://acctbank.com/client/home/shop-account to see new products and the current stock.Payments:Bitcoin (BTC)Ethereum (ETH)Litecoin (LTC)All crypto coinPerfect moneyPaypalBank transferDelivery: Automatic Instant Delivery: You get your product on the next page as all accounts have been loaded on siteRefund policy:We Guarantee a 24-hour replacement policy for locked accounts and 48 hours replacement policy for accounts In case we fail to provide a full replacement within 48 business hours, we will provide a full refund to your wallet on-site for customers to take other products. This warranty does not include the following Customer breaking the rules of usage of an account  Use of bad-quality IP addresses and  Compromised devices and/or cookie profiles. Affilate Program:The affiliate program enables customers to earn more from purchases of friends and others, All they need to participate is by referring other customers using their referral links.Frequently Asked Questions:Are these accounts legal? Absolutely yes. We do not sell cracked accounts nor any sensitive information - all of our accounts are legally sold by original owners of them  With that said, you can always expect high-quality profiles with realistic names. Do the accounts come with the recovery email? Some of our email accounts come with the recovery email attached, and others with full access to the recovery email Can I change the password after logging in? You are free to change any information. We suggest not changing the password on the very first login, in order to avoid red flags. Can I use a VPN when logging in?You can use VPN to log in to the accounts, it is outermost important that you do that (recommended VPN Is Surfsharf VPN Do you provide bulk discounts?Of course. Simply let us know the product(s) you are looking for and the exact quantity in order to receive a price quote.prices are lesser for bulk purchases.Disclaimer: We have plenty of reviews on other websites, however, we are not allowed to post them here due to the forum rules. If you have any doubt, keep in mind that we accept Paypal payments, other than non-reversible cryptocurrencies. On top of that, we accept any trusted middleman or escrow - as long as you pay every fee.Contacts:Telegram:https://t.me/acctbankgrTelegram channel:https://t.me/acctbankgroupEmail:acctbank825@gmail.com [/list][/list][/list][/list]
